mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KUKOKUK_QUIZ_RESULTS (SESSION_NO, SELECTED_CHOICE, IS_SUCCESS, USER_NO, QUIZ_NO) VALUES (#{sessionNo}, #{selectedChoice}, #{isSuccess}, #{userNo}, #{quizNo})
mapper.select:
SELECT qm.QUIZ_NO AS quizNo, qm.QUESTION AS question, qm.OPTION1 AS option1, qm.OPTION2 AS option2, qm.OPTION3 AS option3, qm.OPTION4 AS option4, qr.SELECTED_CHOICE AS selectedChoice, qm.SUCCESS_ANSWER AS successAnswer, qr.IS_SUCCESS AS isSuccess, qm.QUESTION_TYPE AS questionType,
CASE WHEN qb.QUIZ_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS bookmarked FROM KUKOKUK_QUIZ_RESULTS qr JOIN KUKOKUK_QUIZ_MASTERS qm ON qr.QUIZ_NO = qm.QUIZ_NO
LEFT JOIN KUKOKUK_QUIZ_BOOKMARKED qb ON qr.QUIZ_NO = qb.QUIZ_NO AND qb.USER_NO = #{userNo} WHERE qr.SESSION_NO = #{sessionNo} AND qr.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY qr.RESULT_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE KUKOKUK_QUIZ_MASTERS SET ACCURACY_RATE = CASE WHEN USAGE_COUNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUCCESS_COUNT * 100.0 / USAGE_COUNT) END WHERE QUIZ_NO = #{quizNo}

UPDATE KUKOKUK_QUIZ_MASTERS SET DIFFICULTY = CASE WHEN ACCURACY_RATE <= 30 THEN 'ÏÉÅ' WHEN ACCURACY_RATE > 30 AND ACCURACY_RATE <= 60 THEN 'Ï§ë' WHEN ACCURACY_RATE > 60 THEN 'Ìïò' END WHERE QUIZ_NO = #{quizNo}
